prompt: Edit the uploaded photo. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, eyes, nose, lips, jawline, expression, age, skin tone unchanged. Eyelashes: exact original length, curl, density, direction. Eyebrows: exact original shape, color, arch, thickness. No modifications to any facial feature. SKIN: Retain natural texture with visible pores, remove only minor blemishes (acne, redness). Add soft natural freckles across nose and cheeks. Hydrated dewy glow, no plastic smoothing. ADD: One hand touching the temple wearing a [GLOVE_COLOR] [GLOVE_MATERIAL] glove. Glove must look realistic with proper fabric folds and light reflections. BACKGROUND: Solid black, clean, no gradient. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction and framing. Sharp focus on face, natural skin detail, visible pores. 4:5 vertical format, original photo dimensions.
